Race.SpecificTitle: PW Tourist and Recreation Commission -- 2% Hotel Occup. Tax - BOD - Perp
Race.SummaryText: Parishwide Tourist and Recreation Commission Proposition
Race.FullText: Shall the Sabine Parish Tourist and Recreation Commission (the "Commission"), under the provisions of Act No. 234 of the 2015 Regular Session of the Louisiana Legislature (the "Act"), and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of two percent (2%) (the "Tax"), in perpetuity, beginning January 1, 2016, upon the paid occupancy of hotel rooms within the Parish of Sabine (the Tax to be in addition to any other taxes thereon) (an estimated $100,000 expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) to be used for recreational and tourism infrastructure, the term "hotel" having the meaning set forth in La. R.S. 33:4574.1.1.C.(1)?
